name: Endless Terror
description:
What happens if you wake up in a strange bed, wondering endlessly...

Is it a dream? or is this real?
Delve into the mystery horror that is Endless Terror

As you explore are you going crazy or are you actually getting somewhere?

Not just a horror this game will play on your fears and work to scare the hell out of you

This is a work in progess game, i will keep the build updated constantly, feedback would be awesome!
